summary: A newly wedded husband plays a practical joke on his wife's family with full support from his wife and friends.
cast: Dharmendra|Sharmila Tagore|Amitabh Bachchan|Jaya Bachchan|David Abraham|Usha Kiran|Lily Chakravarty|Keshto Mukherjee|Dev Kishan|Om Prakash|Lalita Kumari|Naina Apte|Chaitali|Aarti|Amol Sen|Harish Magon|Vishal Desai|Masterji|Asrani
keywords: neo screwball comedy|brother in law brother in law relationship|chauffeur|prank|breaking the fourth wall
title: Chupke Chupke
